background_image_description: Off-white paper texture with subtle grain, overlaid by evenly spaced vertical stripes alternating very light gray (#ececec) and slightly darker gray (#dddddd) across the entire 1131x1600 canvas.

nodes.asset_description: Center-aligned hand-drawn cobalt-blue sketch of a lobster with raised claws inside a vertically oriented oval medallion. The medallion has a double-line border and an inner ring of evenly spaced dots; all strokes are the same blue. The lobster drawing features segmented tail, antennae, legs, and speckled claws with expressive brush lines and a few white highlights on the left tail fin.
